com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders

Class HLSAssetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders.AssetBuilder<HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams>
      • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders.HLSAssetBuilder
  • public class HLSAssetBuilder extends AssetBuilder<HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams>
    The HLSAssetBuilder is used to build the parameters for an HLS asset download. The build() method will then produce an HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams which can be passed to com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IAssetManager#createHLSSegmentedAsset(HLSAssetParams) or com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IAssetManager#createHLSSegmentedAssetAsync(HLSAssetParams) to create a new asset.

      desiredVideoBitrate 
      HLSAssetBuilder desiredVideoBitrate(int val)
      Set the desired video bitrate for this asset.
      public HLSAssetBuilder desiredVideoBitrate(int val)
      Set the desired video bitrate for this asset. Virtuoso uses the closest bitrate, which does not exceed this one, when generating from a playlist. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than aDesiredBitRate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of Integer.MAX_VALUE means "use the highest bitrate."
      Parameters:
      val - The desired bitrate
      Returns:
      The asset builder for chaining.

      Parameters:
      val - If true, Virtuoso will download all the encryption keys.
      Returns:

      usesFastPlay 
      HLSAssetBuilder usesFastPlay(boolean useFastPlay)
      Set if this asset should support fastplay.
      public HLSAssetBuilder usesFastPlay(boolean useFastPlay)
      Set if this asset should support fastplay. If set then this asset will be setup for fastplay regardless of if it is queued for download. Fastplay downloads do not report progress using the same observers as queued assets, instead they download silently. The queue observers will be notified of an update upon completion and the asset will be marked as fastplay ready, which can be checked with IAsset.fastPlayReady().
      Parameters:
      useFastPlay - true to use fastplay for the asset. Default is false.
      Returns:
      The asset builder for chaining.
      withAncillaryFiles 
      HLSAssetBuilder withAncillaryFiles(java.util.List<AncillaryFile> list)

      withPermissionObserver 
      HLSAssetBuilder withPermissionObserver(IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver val)
      Set a permission observer to be notified of the result of permission checks which will be made during queuing the asset.
      public HLSAssetBuilder withPermissionObserver(IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver val)
      Set a permission observer to be notified of the result of permission checks which will be made during queuing the asset. Adding this observer will force the SDK to perform a permission check during the queuing process. If the observer is not present then the permissions will only be checked at queue time if other conditions are met such as Request on queue backplane settings.
      Parameters:
      val - The observer to be notified of any permission checks when added.
      Returns:
      The asset builder for chaining.
